questions.question: What is the default port number for HTTP?
What does the acronym DNS stand for?
Which protocol is used for secure data transmission over the Internet?
What is the purpose of an IP address?
options: To identify a device on a network
To connect to a wireless network
questions.answer: To identify a device on a network

questions.question: Which device operates at the Network Layer of the OSI model?
What is the primary function of a firewall in network security?
options: To filter incoming and outgoing network traffic
questions.answer: To filter incoming and outgoing network traffic

questions.question: Which type of IP address is reserved for loopback testing?
What is the purpose of the subnet mask in networking?
options: To identify the network portion of an IP address
To connect devices to a network
questions.answer: To identify the network portion of an IP address

questions.question: Which protocol is used for email communication?
What is the purpose of NAT (Network Address Translation)?
options: To map private IP addresses to a public IP address
questions.answer: To map private IP addresses to a public IP address

questions.question: Which layer of the OSI model is responsible for logical addressing and routing?
What is the purpose of a MAC address?
options: To identify a device on a network
To connect to a wireless network
questions.answer: To identify a device on a network

questions.question: What is the main function of a router in a network?
options: To connect devices within the same local network
To connect devices to the Internet
To filter incoming and outgoing network traffic
questions.answer: To connect devices to the Internet

questions.question: Which type of cable is commonly used for wired Ethernet networks?
What is the purpose of the ARP (Address Resolution Protocol) in networking?
options: To map IP addresses to MAC addresses
questions.answer: To map IP addresses to MAC addresses

questions.question: Which type of network topology connects all devices in a daisy chain?
What is the purpose of the DHCP (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol) in networking?
Which layer of the OSI model is responsible for error detection and correction?
What is the purpose of the ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) in networking?
options: To send error messages and network information
questions.answer: To send error messages and network information

questions.question: Which type of network device operates at the Data Link Layer of the OSI model?
